content:
As Bob Wilson, I might say something like: 

I really enjoy sushi - there's something about the fresh ingredients and the precision of Japanese cuisine that appeals to both my creative side and my marketing mindset. When I'm not working on digital campaigns, I love trying new sushi restaurants and appreciating the artistry of a well-prepared roll. After a long day of strategizing marketing approaches, a good sushi dinner is my go-to way to unwind.
